testCases.name: Application Loads Successfully
testCases.description: Verify the application loads with actual functional content, not just placeholder
steps: Wait for page to fully load
Verify navigation menu is present and functional
Verify page contains bakery-specific content (not 'Vite + React' placeholder)
Check for product listings or categories
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays a fully functional bakery e-commerce interface with navigation, product information, and branding
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' text or generic placeholder content, this test MUST FAIL

testCases.name: User Registration - Valid Data
testCases.description: Test successful user registration with valid information
steps: Verify automatic login and redirect to customer dashboard
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is registered, logged in, and redirected to /account

testCases.name: User Login - Valid Credentials
testCases.description: Test login with valid customer credentials
testCases.expectedOutcome: User is authenticated and redirected to /account

testCases.name: User Login - Invalid Credentials
steps: Verify user remains on login page
testCases.expectedOutcome: Login fails with 'Invalid credentials' error message

testCases.name: Account Lockout After Failed Attempts
testCases.description: Verify account locks after 5 failed login attempts
steps: Attempt login 5 times with incorrect password
Verify account is locked on 5th attempt
Try logging in with correct password
Wait 30 minutes or use admin unlock
Verify account can login after unlock
testCases.expectedOutcome: Account locks after 5 failed attempts and unlocks after timeout

testCases.name: Password Reset Flow
steps: Check email logs for reset token
testCases.expectedOutcome: Password is reset and user can login with new credentials

testCases.name: Role-Based Access Control - Customer
testCases.description: Verify customer cannot access staff/admin routes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer is restricted to customer-only routes

testCases.name: Role-Based Access Control - Staff
testCases.description: Verify staff can access staff routes but not admin routes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Staff has access to staff routes only

testCases.name: Role-Based Access Control - Admin
testCases.description: Verify admin has full system access
steps: Verify access to all admin routes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Admin has unrestricted access to all routes

testCases.name: Session Expiry Warning
testCases.description: Verify session expiry warning appears before timeout
testCases.expectedOutcome: User receives warning and can extend session

testCases.name: Browse Products Catalog
steps: Navigate to a location menu page
Verify products are displayed in grid/list
Verify each product shows: name, price, image, description
Verify products match seed data (20 products)
Verify categories are shown (pastries, breads, cakes, corporate)
testCases.expectedOutcome: All products are displayed with complete information

testCases.name: Filter Products by Category
testCases.expectedOutcome: Products filter correctly by category

testCases.name: Filter Products by Dietary Tags
testCases.expectedOutcome: Products filter correctly by dietary restrictions

testCases.name: Search Products
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search returns relevant products

testCases.name: View Product Details
steps: Verify redirected to product detail page
Verify product name, price, description displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product detail page shows complete information

testCases.name: Add Product to Favorites
testCases.description: Test adding product to favorites (requires login)
steps: Verify product appears in favorites list
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product is added to customer's favorites

testCases.name: Add Product to Cart
testCases.description: Test adding products to shopping cart
steps: Verify cart icon shows item count
Verify product appears in cart with correct quantity and price
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product is added to cart with correct quantity

testCases.name: Update Cart Quantity
testCases.description: Test updating product quantity in cart
testCases.expectedOutcome: Cart quantity and subtotal update correctly

testCases.name: Remove Product from Cart
testCases.expectedOutcome: Product is removed and cart updates

testCases.name: Cart Persistence
testCases.expectedOutcome: Cart contents persist across sessions

testCases.name: Checkout - Guest Not Allowed
steps: Add products to cart (not logged in)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Guest users must login before checkout

testCases.name: Checkout Step 1 - Delivery Details
testCases.description: Complete first step of checkout with delivery
steps: Select existing address or enter new address
testCases.expectedOutcome: Delivery details captured and proceed to payment

testCases.name: Checkout Step 1 - Collection
testCases.description: Complete first step of checkout with collection
testCases.expectedOutcome: Collection details captured and proceed to payment

testCases.name: Checkout Step 2 - Apply Promo Code
testCases.description: Test promo code application during checkout
testCases.expectedOutcome: Promo code applies 10% discount to order

testCases.name: Checkout Step 2 - Redeem Loyalty Points
steps: Login as customer with loyalty points
testCases.expectedOutcome: Loyalty points redeemed and deducted from total

testCases.name: Checkout Step 2 - Complete Payment
testCases.expectedOutcome: Payment processed and order created successfully

testCases.name: Checkout Step 3 - Order Confirmation
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order confirmation shows complete order details

testCases.name: Checkout - Minimum Order Validation
testCases.description: Verify minimum order value for delivery
steps: Add items totaling less than minimum (£15)
Verify error message about minimum order
Add more items to meet minimum
testCases.expectedOutcome: Minimum order validation enforced for delivery

testCases.name: View Order History
steps: Verify each order shows: number, date, total, status
testCases.expectedOutcome: Customer can view complete order history

testCases.name: Track Order Status
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order status updates appear in real-time

testCases.name: Cancel Order
testCases.description: Customer cancels order within allowed window
testCases.expectedOutcome: Order is cancelled and refund processed

testCases.name: Submit Order Feedback
testCases.description: Customer provides feedback on completed order
testCases.expectedOutcome: Feedback is submitted and bonus points awarded

testCases.name: Earn Loyalty Points on Order
testCases.description: Verify points are earned when order completes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Loyalty points earned and added to balance

testCases.name: View Loyalty Points Transactions
steps: Login as customer with transaction history
Verify each shows: date, type, points, balance, description

testCases.name: Staff Updates Order Status

testCases.name: Staff Creates Inventory Alert

testCases.name: Real-Time Order Notifications

Login as customer in another browser
Verify admin receives new order notification
Verify customer receives status update notification

steps: In another window, place an order
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard metrics update via WebSocket

Verify navigation collapses to hamburger menu
Verify product grid adjusts to single column
Verify text is readable without zooming
Verify checkout flow works on mobile
Test cart slide panel on mobile

Verify loading overlay on page transitions
Verify loading disappears when data loads

testCases.name: Accessibility - Keyboard Navigation

testCases.name: Modal Dialogs

testCases.name: Form Validation

Verify search returns no results or errors safely
